detailsOfAchievement: THE NGO since its foundation is working for overall society empowerment. The NGO has run many successful medical camps in the districts of Raebareilly amethi Lucknow Bijnoe Jyotiba Phule Nagar and other districts of Uttar Pradesh. NGO has conducted successful enviourmental awareness camp seminar in the state of UP and Uttarakhand. The NGO on observation of EARTH DAY every Year plants more than five thousand of plants in various districts of uttar pradesh. The NGO runs legal awareness camp for poor especially the DALITS of western UP The NGO has vast experience of conducting workshop seminar on Agriculture awareness and Agro Advisiory to farmers. The NGO is also working for women and children and celebrates children and womens day enthusiastically in various rural schools The NGO has also conducted Educational Vocational training to unemployed , under skilled people in the district of Bijnor to help them in getting employement.

detailsOfAchievement: Uttar Pradesh Development Systems Corporation Ltd. Was set up on March 15, 1977, under section 21 of the Companies Act 1956. The Corporation is a fully owned Government Company under the aegis of Department of Information Technology and Electronics, Government of Uttar Pradesh. The authorized capital is Rs. 200 lacs and the paid up capital of the Corporation is Rs. 100 lacs. This corporation is a multidisciplinary IT and consultancy organisation providing systems back-up to Government departments, Public Sector enterprises, International organisations and other nongovernmental agencies in diagnosing and estimating the magnitude of problems, identifying technological and other alternatives and suggesting methods of improvement. Ever since its inception, it has made IT and consultancy services available in various fields to the government and to International organisations like the International Labour Organisation, UNICEF. The World Bank, Royal Government of Netherlands, Japan International Co-operation Agency, EC and ODA etc. The Corporation is staffed with highly qualified personnel in various fields.

detailsOfAchievement: Activities The major activities of organization are as below To run the special school for the hearing impaired children from primary to upper primary Running pre-primary education program me for young hearing impaired children Providing secondary education to hearing impaired children Developing the speech and language of the children with hearing impairment As per need we support to children individually for their skill development Conducting a special auditory training for their residual hearing development Making ear mould for fitting of hearing aid Guide to parents for the development of their children and facilities available for the disabled person by the Government Placement for education, job, and marriage also The school also provide the vocational training such as in wood craft, tailoring ,drawing trades along with their education The school is helping to parents and their hearing impaired child to get the disability certificate and free hearing aid by the concern authority Outdoor and indoor games is conducting for the children to develop their personality, physical, mental, leadership and self confidence etc. Providing the scholarship and transportation amount to the beneficiaries as per policy of Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment Govt. of India ,New Delhi Conducting the cultural , game and sports ,CBR and public awareness program me To encourage and repaying to the children to participate in various competition conducting by school and others agencies Organizing teacher parents meeting for development of hearing impaired children We are also developing the computer skills in hearing impaired children at secondary level Achievement We feel that the school is involve in education of the hearing impaired children from a long time since establishment 1929 . Since the time and at present we found the following achievement has been obtained by the school such as Thousands of hearing impaired person has been received education. The many of the skill they have been develop along with their education such as listening, speaking , communication, reading and writing , personality ,behavior, self confidence and others aims and objective of education The most of the passed out students of the school have been employed or self employed in Government /Private sectors Many of the children at the primary and pre-primary level have been integrated in general school by develop their skills Not only of State of U.P. ,M.P.,Bihar , Jhorkhand states hearing impaired children are getting the residential facilities along with their education The school management ,teachers, children are always participate /support in any programme which are conducting by the Government authority or other agencies in the programme for disabled The school is creating a good environment for the better rehabilitation of hearing impaired person by the keeping the goal of equal opportunity ,full participant and protection of right of the children It is a historical school of North India which is well known by the person ,public ,social agencies and Government sectors . The school is also popular in other part of the State/Country accept Uttar Pradesh

detailsOfAchievement: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss;  Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all;  Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all;  End hunger, achieve food security and improve nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture;  End poverty in all its forms particularly in indigenous people facing the danger of extinction;  Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all stages;  Ensure inclusive and equitable quality, primary, secondary technical, vocational and tertiary education, including university and skill development;  Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls;  Promote inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all;  Reduce inequality within and among states & countries;  Make smart villages, towns, cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable;  Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns for reducing degradation, pollution and poverty;  Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts; and  Disaster and conflict management by reducing risk factors, addressing environmental needs and support, peace building and promoting sustainable development. Utthan has impacted a wide range of areas that relate to holistic landscape management, human development, tackle impacts of climate change and improved natural resources management. Its work has led to:-  Conservation, restoration, afforestation, protection and sustainable use of 10 million hectares of deforested and degraded forest lands involving 5 million indigenous families under Joint Forest Management, improving productivity, profitability, prosperity and peace;  Raising awareness, support, engagement and investment in agroforestry of 10,000 forest villages and other villages involving 10 million indigenous families, eradicating poverty and hunger and promoting peace and happiness;  Rehabilitation, restoration and reclamation of 100,000 hectares of mined, degraded & chemically polluted lands, economically benefiting more than one million poor and vulnerable people;  Provision of safe drinking water and sanitation to more than one million households;  Distribution of improved germplasm saplings, 200 million in number in 20 years to raise agroforestry plantations;  Nearly 3 million indigenous people becoming literate, educated and skilled through education and training;  Health care for one million infants and children and 0.75 million women and 0.5 million other patients;  Creation of environmental awakening to 3 million people for achieving sustainability;  Promotion of cultivation of sugar cane & Jatropha and production of bioethanol, biodiesel and biomethane as green energy;  Promotion of cultivation and processing of medicinal plants and herbal drugs for health care and nutrition; and  Conservation and development of Bharia and Baiga vulnerable tribes facing the danger of extinction.
